data.title: John Steinbeck – Prize presentation
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 1962 was awarded to John Steinbeck "for his realistic and imaginative writings, combining as they do sympathetic humour and keen social perception"
data.text:
John Steinbeck

Prize presentation

Your browser does not support the video tag.

Watch a video clip of the 1962 Nobel Laureate in Literature, John Steinbeck, receiving his Nobel Prize medal and diploma during the Nobel Prize Award Ceremony at the Concert Hall in Stockholm, Sweden, on 10 December 1962.

To cite this section
